resources.string: What is Top Deals Service all about?

Top Deals is a Smartphone Application service which provides a platform to view best Deals & Discounts on Top Brands in Pakistan. With major brands on-board ranging from fashion & lifestyle to health & fitness, Shopping, Restaurants and much more, Top Deals has it All!\n\n Top Deals also offers a variety of Exclusive Deals available to the users who can later avail them from the respective stores/outlets via deal redemption process.
What do I get from Top Deals?

Top Deals users get Exclusive Deals & Discounts along with latest updates of the related categories. The user can also search any business of their liking and get the contact details. The categories for which deals & updates are offered are as follows: 
		1. Top Deals 
		2. Food Deals 
		3. Shopping 
		4. Lifestyle 
		5. Entertainment
How to use Top Deals Application?
In order to use Top Deals Application, following steps are to be followed:
1. User downloads the Top Deals Smartphone Application from Play Store.
2. User Signs in by entering his/her number.
3. User is free to use the Application without any charges.
What are the Smartphone Application Charges?
Top Deals Application is free of any cost. User is neither charged for downloading nor for using it.
How can a User Redeem Exclusive Deals?
The User can redeem the deal through following steps:
Step 1: User views the deal on APP. \nStep 2: User will have to click on Redeem Deal Button. (Only for Exclusive Deals) \nStep 3: User will have to enter merchant code.
i. Merchant can enter the code for User on their mobile. \nii. Merchant can share the code with User. \niii. Merchant codes will be put on display in their shops and User can enter it himself.
How can a user Sign-Out from this service?
User can sign-out by simply clicking on ‘Sign Out’ button from Main Menu, given on the home screen. Once done, the user will exit the Application.
Please enter a valid Mobile Number
